com.k2.Wiget

Class WigetFamily<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Wiget.WigetFamily<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - The output type of the wigets in the family
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemplateFamily, TestWigetFamily

    public abstract class WigetFamily<O>
extends java.lang.Object
    A wiget family groups together wigets that are designed to work together and as such in the absence of other restrictions all wigets within a family can be contained with other wigets of the same family, however they cannot be contained and cannot contain wigets from another family. Wiget families also define a list of required wiget implementation. This list guarantees a minimum set of wigets that must be implemented for a wiget factory to be created for the wiget family.
    Author:
    simon

        Create an instance of a wiget family specifying the alias, output type and the array of wiget specifications (interfaces) that are required by this wiget family
        Parameters:
        alias - The wiget family alias
        outputType - The output type of all wigets in the family
        requires - The array of wiget specifications that must be implemented in order for this wiget family to used to create a wiget factory.
